data.title: Reutlingen climate: Weather Reutlingen & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Reutlingen

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Reutlingen

>>average temperature by month Reutlingen

>>Weather Reutlingen

The climate is warm and temperate in Reutlingen. Reutlingen is a city with a significant rainfall. Even in the driest month there is a lot of rain. Köppen and Geiger classify this climate as Cfb. The average annual temperature in Reutlingen is 9.2 °C | 48.6 °F. Precipitation here is about 934 mm | 36.8 inch per year.

Reutlingen is located in the northern hemisphere. The balmy days of Summer commence at the end of June and conclude in September. This period encompasses the months: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Reutlingen

The driest month is February, with 60 mm | 2.4 inch of rainfall. Most of the precipitation here falls in May, averaging 100 mm | 3.9 inch.

average temperature by month Reutlingen

The warmest month of the year is July, with an average temperature of 18.4 °C | 65.2 °F. January is the coldest month, with temperatures averaging 0.1 °C | 32.2 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Reutlingen

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The difference in precipitation between the driest month and the wettest month is 40 mm | 2 inch. Throughout the year, temperatures vary by 18.3 °C | 33.0 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (84.27 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is July (68.06 %). The wettest month is December (14.37 days). The driest month is February (11.00 days).

Airport close to Reutlingen

The closest Airports of Reutlingen are: Stuttgart Airport (STR) 22.14km,Baden Airport (FKB) 88.46km,Friedrichshafen Airport (FDH) 93.98km

You can reach Reutlingen from this Cities by Plane: London (STN), Athens (ATH), Copenhagen (CPH), Vienna (VIE), Paris (CDG), Birmingham (BHX), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Bremen (BRE), Alicante (ALC), Málaga (AGP), Faro (FAO), Funchal (FNC), Porto (OPO), Ankara (ESB), Bilbao (BIO), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFS), Rijeka (RJK), Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (LPA)
